page.title: 16LIFE AT PENPONDS FARM
page.content: { { HOME LIFE} _________ William Trevethan, owner of Penponds Farm, farms the land of 42 acres with help from his wife and 2 teenaged sons. He built the 3-bedroom house at Penponds (newly created from a larger farm) for his family in 1982, before that having lived in a mobile home while establishing the dariy farm and awaiting 3 years for planning permission. Mr. Trevethan frequently attends farm sales to see how other farmers manage their land, to compare farming methods, and occasionally to buy machinery. He works in the daylight hours and enjoys television while relaxing. He also is an active member of Threemilestone Methodist Church.
